April 19, 1987 D Pontins Hemsby (Second Section)
Pontins Hemsby (Second Section) 20 Test Piece Contest Pontins (Hemsby) - Qualifiers pontins-hemsby-second-section Pontins (Second Section)
The Wand of Youth [arr. Gay]
Hemsby Holiday Centre, Norfolk Bands were asked to play 4 movements only in the following order (not in the order printed):- (1) March, (2) The Tame Bear, (3) Moths and Butterflies, and (4) The Wild Bears.
Feb. 24, 2011, 1:01 p.m. March 5, 2011, 2:44 p.m.
1 Towcester Studio Band Peter Wain
2 Haverhill Silver Band Les Ager
3 Kibworth Band A. G. Mason
4 Northfleet Brass Ron Cooper
5 Norfolk Brass Ensemble Melvin White
